modName: TERA Armors Collection - UNP Breast Butt Bounce Compatibility Patch
summary: UNP Breast Butt Bounce Compatibility Patch for TERA Armors Collection by asianboy345
descriptionHtml:
Breast, Butt Bounce Compatibility Patch for TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim by asianboy345
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />I used Outfit Studio by Caliente (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?) and body skeleton by Turbosundance (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21199/?) to make this mod.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />- Requirements -
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female, Version 1.91 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />DIMONIZED UNP female body (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />UNP UNPC HDT BBP TBBP, Version 4.01 for breast / butt bounce on UNP body (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21199/?)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />XP32 Maximum Skeleton (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />and bbp/tbbp compatible animation mods
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />- Installation -
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />If you have already installed UNP UNPC HDT BBP TBBP and other mods for breast, butt bounce animations, just overwrite this mod on original TERA Armors Collection.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />If you don't have installed any mods for breast and butt bounce, please follow this.
<br /><br /><br />0. Install SKSE
<br /><br /><br />1. Install FNIS (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?),
<br /><br /><br />XPMS (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?),
<br /><br /><br />and HDT Physics Extensions (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?)
<br /><br /><br /> for breast and butt bounce.
<br /><br /><br />2. Install DIMONIZED UNP female body (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?) and custom body textures(e.g. SG Textures)
<br /><br /><br />3. Install UNP UNPC HDT BBP TBBP, Version 4.01 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21199/?)
<br /><br /><br />4. Install the original mod, TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim, Version 1.91 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?)
<br /><br /><br />5. Install this mod
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />- Credits -
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female by asianboy345 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />DIMONIZED UNP female body (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />UNP UNPC HDT BBP TBBP by Turbosundance (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21199/?)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by Caliente (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?)
author: ttfjm
